## PolicyLoader.(constructor)

Load policy bundles from [Cerbos Hub](https://www.cerbos.dev/product-cerbos-hub)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor({ ruleId, scopes, activateOnLoad, interval, onUpdate, userAgent, ...options }: PolicyLoaderOptions);
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

## Example 1

Unauthenticated access:

```typescript
const loader = new PolicyLoader({ ruleId: "B5LU9EVYN1MD" });
```

## Example 2

Authenticate with a client credential:

```typescript
import { credentialsFromEnv } from "@cerbos/hub";

const loader = new PolicyLoader({
  ruleId: "B5LU9EVYN1MD",
  credentials: credentialsFromEnv(),
});
```

## Example 3

Handle policy update errors:

```typescript
const loader = new PolicyLoader({
  ruleId: "B5LU9EVYN1MD",
  onUpdate: (error) => {
    if (error) {
      console.error("Cerbos policy update failed:", error);
    } else {
      console.info("Cerbos policies updated successfully");
    }
  },
});
```
